title: Looking for Plat Adc for solo/duo
body:
I'll play support Soraka. I expect you to have one of the following voice comms: Skype, Teamspeak, or Discord.I expect you to have a relatively small champ pool as that is best for climbing. Absolutely no toxicity! I want to climb, not shit talk about how people in my elo are bad.
Add me In-game If you are interested.

replies.body: Feel free to check out my op.gg. I can play Lucian, Twitch, Jhin, or Vayne. I can also do Ezreal, but been having a rough running lately.
